name: stars and creatures
description:
your old enemy, the stars, have been defeated! luckily the creatures have escaped notice for now, but now the stars need your help! can you repair all the stars in each area?

press "select" to jump and "cancel" to take the form of light.

made for #TheSylvieShuffle

inspired by sylvie's games, her 7 Rules of GameDesign, and Colleen's The stars vs creatures
